text: A fight between two teenagers outside of
a Suffach County high school ended with
an arrest after the mother of one of the
teens involved jumped in and started
swinging a metal water bottle. Her
intervention left one of the teens with
a big gash on her forehead. Whenever I
talk about teen violence or youth
violence as the media likes to paint it,
oftent times I will receive comments
criticizing the parents of those teens,
the parents of those youths when in
reality 100% of the time this is
actually not true. In fact, we recently
did a story about a teen carjacker who
stole multiple vehicles, whose mother
actually not only went to the court
demanding consequences, but went to the
media demanding consequences for her son
because she understood that him getting
slaps on the wrist was only enabling his
criminal behavior. And in those
instances where the parent is trying
their best, but the kid is out of
control and they absolutely want
consequences from the criminal justice
system, but the woke judges or woke
prosecutor refuse to deliver. I think we
really need to go out of our way to
praise those parents. However, in this
case, in this particular story, not only
do I believe that the mother is
responsible for her daughter's violent
tendencies, but the mother herself
decided that it would be appropriate to
participate in a fight when she saw her
daughter in an argument, and she
actually physically assaulted a
14-year-old girl with a weapon. This is
what we're going to talk about today.
It's absolute madness. But before we do,
